text: Number : .............................. Subject : Promotional Program Istanbul, ..../....../ 20… Dear....................... ................................. ................................. Dear.................., Sabancı University, with modern educational ideals, hopes to be an international university contributing to Turkey's goal in creating an educated nation. In order to interest our nation’s best students, we plan to promote the University by showing them the campus and informing them of our academic programs and scholarship options. To follow up on our telephone conversations, we would like to meet you and your students. In order to introduce Sabancı University and to answer any questions you may have, we would like to visit your high school. If you accept, we would like to send a group of teachers to your school on ..../......./ 20…, between the hours of ....... -......... If these times are not suitable, please contact the people below. We wish you the best of luck with your work. Sincerely, Name Last Name Director of Student Resources Contact people: Student Resources Unit: .............................................................................................. ..........................................................................................
